definition: erhua variant of 點|点[dian3]

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final
erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
slightly/a little/somewhat
erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
erhua variant of 差一點|差一点[cha4 yi1 dian3]
variant of 居民點|居民点[ju1 min2 dian3]
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]
drip of rain
a bit/a little
(dialect) to be out of luck

sentences.english: The exchange rate fluctuates every day.
sentences.chinese: 今天的汇率比昨天稍微低一点儿。

sentences.english: I need some medicine for my cold.
sentences.chinese: 我想买点儿治感冒的药。

sentences.english: He has had a bit of trouble, and I have to straighten it out for him.
sentences.chinese: 他遇到了点儿麻烦，我得替他把这事了结掉。

sentences.english: I'm feeling goose bumps now. I was having death threats, I never felt safe for 3 and a half years.
sentences.chinese: 有人恐吓说要我的命，那三年半我没有一点儿安全感。

sentences.english: I want to enroll in a driving school. Do you have any advice?
sentences.chinese: 我想报驾校。你能给我点儿建议吗？

sentences.english: On the half way to the mountain, the tourists had a rest and snacked on some bread.
sentences.chinese: 在登山的途中，游客们休息了会儿，吃了点儿面包。

sentences.english: Frank, how about some bacon with your French toast ?
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克，弄点儿咸肉就着煎面包片儿吃好不好？

sentences.english: Obviously, Cuiping was nervous and so her smile was not genuine.
sentences.chinese: 翠平显然很紧张，笑声一点儿也不好听。

sentences.english: Iago . I bleed, sir; but not kill'd.
sentences.chinese: 伊阿古我不过流了点儿血，还没有给他杀死。

sentences.english: Just based only on the food here.
So what else could China do with the money?
sentences.chinese: 中国还能拿这些钱来干点儿什么呢？

sentences.english: Could you please drive faster? I'm in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 您能开快点儿吗？我赶时间。

sentences.english: I walk slowly, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 也许走得慢点儿，可我绝不会走回头路。

sentences.english: In this aspect, I think, pater bags have the edge on plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 我认为在这方面纸袋要比塑料袋强一点儿。

sentences.english: and jump in leaves,there is no harm.
sentences.chinese: 在树叶中跳跃，一点儿也不碍事。

sentences.english: She seems like a kook, but she is just grand, really.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去有点儿怪，不过她确实是个好人儿。

definition: erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several
a bit/a little/one dot/one point
slightly/a little/somewhat
dialectal equivalent of 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]/also pr. [sha4]

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
a little
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
I or me/we (including both the speaker and the person spoken to)
variant of 咱[zan2]
see 咱[zan2]
variant of 咱[zan2]
a little bit
to have spare time/free from work/it's not important/it's nothing/never mind
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
battle cry
what?/how?/how about?/whatever/also pr. [zen3 me5 zhe5]
what?/something/anything
